banner_desc:
I'm a web developer specializing in designing and developing websites on the WordPress platform. Proficient in tools like Elementor, Flatsome, and Beaver Builder, I can build custom interfaces, develop plugins as required, and optimize website performance.
In addition, I have a solid technical background with Java / Spring Boot (backend) and ReactJS / AngularJS (frontend), ready to take on full-stack projects when needed. I always prioritize clear architecture, maintainable code, and smooth user experience.
frontend_desc: Proficient in ReactJS, AngularJS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS. Create modern, responsive user interfaces and optimize user experience.
backend_desc: Expert in Java, Spring Boot, RESTful API, PHP, NodeJS. Design multi-layered architectures with SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB.
wordpress_desc: Develop custom WordPress themes/plugins (Elementor, Flatsome). Git, Github, Gitlab.
career_goal_desc: My goal is to develop my career to become a specialized Fullâ€‘stack Engineer, capable of participating and contributing effectively to large-scale projects. I want to deepen my expertise in real-world website development, including both frontend and backend programming, especially on the WordPress platform and modern web technologies. Always proactive in learning, I am committed to bringing sustainable value to products and the development team.
exp1_desc: Designed & developed multiple e-commerce/service websites on WordPress. Built custom plugins (promotion integration, third-party API, admin dashboard). SEO & performance optimization.
exp2_desc: Participated in internal projects, used Beaver Builder plugin to create landing pages.

work6_desc: Funeral service website, consultation and online booking.
